UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Progressive Design of a Ranatuerin-2 Peptide from Amolops wuyiensis: Enhancement of Bioactivity and In Vivo Efficacy.
Literature.Author: Yao A, Liu T, Cai Y, Zhou S, Chen X, Zhou M, Ma C, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:40% Hemolysis=128 µM,Horse erythrocytes:78% Hemolysis=256 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human lung adenocarcinoma NCI-H838(IC50=7.828µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=3.671µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(IC50=12.40µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=10.58µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(IC50=9.284µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=8µM),Enterococcus faecium NTCC 12697(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecium NTCC 12697(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=16µM)
